mapper.insert: insert into hotel_reservation(hotelId, hotelCode, hotelRoomNum, hotelCheckIn, hotelCheckOut) VALUES(#{hotelId}, #{hotelCode}, #{hotelRoomNum}, #{hotelCheckIn}, #{hotelCheckOut})
mapper.select: select hotelRoomNum, hotelCheckIn, hotelCheckOut from hotel_reservation where hotelCode = #{hotelCode}
